thread.title: Saturday tours at New York state Capitol
thread.title_full: Saturday tours at New York state Capitol - seattlepi.com

author: seattlepi
title: Saturday tours at New York state Capitol
text:
ALBANY, N.Y. (AP) â€” Free tours of the New York state Capitol are now being offered on the second Saturday of each month.
The Saturday tours of the historic landmark in Albany begin this week on Aug. 8.
Tours last from 45 minutes to an hour. They are typically offered four times a day, Monday through Friday.
Saturday tours will be limited to 25 people, and visitors should make online reservations at www.empirestateplaza.org.
